text: Louise Currie (born Louise Gunter; April 7, 1913 - September 8, 2013) was an American movie actress. She was active from 1940 until her retirement in 1997. Currie was born on April 7, 1913 in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.Actress Louise Currie. Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, May 17, 2010; retrieved January 26, 2013 She studied at Martha Washington Seminary and at Sarah Lawrence College. Currie was married to John Whitney until they divorced. Then she was married to John Good from 1948 until his death in 1996. Then she was married to Grover Asmus from 2002 until his death in 2003. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1913 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:American silent movie actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American radio actors Category:Actors from Oklahoma City Category:Actors from Beverly Hills, California
title: Louise Currie
